summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of One Hundred ($100.) Dollars out of the General Fund of the City of Seattle to pay the claim of Mary T. Foster for personal injuries received by her on the 25th day of August, 1915, at about 11:00 o'clock A. M., by stepping upon a loose plank in said Garfield Street, in said city, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
